document.full_text: alan r. mulally, chief executive of ford, is to unveil plans on tuesday that call for the company to accelerate expansion and set high growth targets, especially in asia.
document.title: ford strategy will call for stepping up expansion, especially in asia
lines_and_colors: alan r. mulally, chief executive of ford, is to unveil plans on tuesday that call for the company to accelerate expansion and set high growth targets, especially in asia.
